overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, focusing on research related to social media analysis, disinformation, and computational social science. LinkedIn has the largest follower base, while engagement is distributed across platforms. Recent activity includes announcements of publications, research grants, conference presentations, and job opportunities.
